name: adventure star
description:
Here is the true form of the story led by the sacred tree. Feature-length RPG!

An extremely orthodox RPG with a relatively light atmosphere.
Those who want to play with the trial version for the time being can play in the browser, and those who want to sit down and adventure can use the multi-deployment function or download it at the [Sanso Batake Farmer's Market] described in the manual. recommended.
